Aim to use and learn technology for noble purposes to advance human rights. I am interested in any work which challenges me especially on technology front. Bringing technological solutions to complex real-world problems excite me and give me a sense of fulfilment.

Experience

IIHMR University, Jaipur

Data Manager • Jan, 2016 — Present

At IIHMRU I was engaged in a project as Data Manager.My major responsibilities at PMA2020 included cleaning, analyzing and preparing PMA2020 reports and publications. During the data collection period, I monitored submissions of forms to the server and cleaned data continuously as it was submitted. Once data collection was completed, I took the lead on cleaning the final dataset and conducting analysis for PMA2020’s two-page indicator briefs and detailed indicator reports.

During this period I worked as Freelance web developer, Network engineer on various project.

Projects

PMA2020

Data Manager • 2016 — Present

PMA2020 uses innovative mobile technology to support low-cost, rapid-turnaround surveys monitoring key indicators for family planning, water, sanitation and hygiene and other health and development indicators. The project is implemented by local universities and research organizations in 11 countries, deploying a cadre of female resident enumerators trained in mobile-assisted data collection. PMA2020 establishes a sentinel data collection platform that can be utilized for other health program areas

TPO (Training and Placement Office)

Web Developer • Sep2012 March

It was a team project where I was responsible for front hand of the website.

ODK interview

Open Data Kit • Jan 2018

I was interviewed by Hélène Martin. Few lines from my Interview "I want to share my data analysis knowledge and skills as I believe we can enhance our knowledge only by sharing it with others. I’ve found that when ODK connects with STATA, Python, R, Power BI or other tools for analysis, revolutionary things can happen. ODK is the frontend for data collection, and it’s great because it’s customizable and surveys can be set up quickly. But we also need analysis and visualisation to make sense of the data and convert it into useful information which could later be used to design strategies and can be used for future generations' betterment."
